resources.string: YOUR PHONE SEEMS NOT TO BE ROOTED\n\nDroidSheep can only run on phones having superuser access enabled. So if the phone is not rooted and DroidSheep does not work properly, please do not ask for support! Nevertheless, DroidSheep will start for compatibility reasons
I understand and accept the disclaimer
Wifi connection lost or changed. Stopped Listening!
Busybox should be installed in order to run DroidSheep properly. Do you want to install BusyBox from market?
Do you really want to delete all hosts from blacklist?
You must accept this disclaimer in order to use DroidSheep!
Do you really want to exit DroidSheep? If you want to keep it running in background press HOME button!

This will start a debug session. It will start Listening and collect debug information. Let DroidSheep keep listening for some seconds (at least 30) and press "stop". An email will open which contains all debug information. No data will be sent silently!

I hope you like DroidSheep!

DroidSheep is free and open source. Nevertheless, it takes a lot of time to support DroidSheep and also some money for running www.droidsheep.de

So if you would like to appreciate this work, you are very welcome to donate some money to make this happen. 

Thanks!
Yes, your work is worth it!

There is an update available!\nActually there is no automatic update mechanism, but you can uninstall DroidSheep and open "http://www.droidsheep.de" to grab the new version manually from the download section.\nChanges:
choose custom URL to load with hijacked cookies
